H0.text: "What is the cost per ounce?" is the best question to keep in mind while reading the label for maximum effectiveness when buying a sunscreen.

H1.text: Who is the manufacturer? is the best question to keep in mind while reading the label of a sunscreen for maximum effectiveness.

H2.text: Is the product waterproof? is the best question to keep in mind when reading a sunscreen label for maximum effectiveness.

H3.text: How much protection does it provide is the best question to keep in mind when reading a sunscreen label for maximum effectiveness.

A4.text: SPF 30 or above must be used to effectively prevent UV rays from damaging skin cells.

A5.text: Claims of products being 'waterproof' or 'sweatproof' are prohibited.
